entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who used something during the first task of the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: professor binns
entities.description: Professor Binns is described as a teacher who continues to teach even after his own death.

entities.name: goblin rebellions
entities.description: Goblin rebellions are mentioned as something that Professor Binns teaches about.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as someone who gives a cauldron-bottom report.

entities.name: professors mcgonagall and moody
entities.description: Professors McGonagall and Moody are described as teachers who keep students working until the last second of their classes.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as a teacher who would not let students play games in class.

entities.name: triwizard tournament
entities.description: The Triwizard Tournament is mentioned as an event that Harry participated in.
